front.title: Framework For Internet Basic Behavior Metrics

abstract.t: This document provides a definition of Internet Basic Behavior Measurement(IBBM) based on the Internet architecture and describes in detail the specifications to be followed for the metrics and measurement activities under IBBM, which are given in the form of elements. The main purpose of this document is to standardize the accurate meaning and expression of metrics obtained based on Internet behavioral measurement activities, to improve the worth of the measurement results.
